author: Robin Marx
description:
The seventh volume of Old Moon Quarterly delivers more of the high quality dark fantasy readers of the magazine have come to expect. In addition to genre titans like Michael Moorcock, Tanith Lee, and Glen Cook, the editors of Old Moon Quarterly have been outspoken about their enthusiasm for contemporary media touchstones like Berserk, Bloodborne, […]

The post REVIEW: Old Moon Quarterly, Vol. 7 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Old Moon Quarterly, Vol. 7
